HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Added BetterPawnControl to the Restrict Tab! You can now bulk assignment colonist to restricted areas! | HOW TO USE 1. Create a policy either for animals or for colonists by clicking the dented wheel icon 2. Select and activate a new created policy 3. Configure the policy by setting the areas or outfits, etc as you always do 4. Done.|Repeat this process for other policies and THEN change between them in one click. WIN!
Added default drug policy Fixed rare bug where a policy would become stuck Fixed default policies not being saved
